Electrified_Net_Arrow.help: Upon impact, the Electrified Net Arrow releases an electrically charged net that can Immobilize most targets. This device deals electric damage over time but and does not prevent targets from attacking. The Electrified Net Arrow can bring down flying entities, halts jumping and slows all of their actions. Electrified Net Arrow has a fairly low Endurance cost and a bonus to its Accuracy. Recharge: Fast
Electrified_Net_Arrow.shortHelp: Ranged, Moderate DOT(Energy), Target Immobilize, -Fly, Slow
Electrified_Net_Arrow.targetHelp: You have been caught in a net. You cannot move or fly and your actions are slowed.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.

Glue_Arrow.help: This arrow carries a cartridge of intensely sticky glue, which explodes on impact. The glue slows the movement and attack rates of any foes in the area. Recharge: Very Slow

messages.attackerHit: You use a {PowerName} to create a sticky patch of ground!

Ice_Arrow.help: This arrow can freeze a single foe in a block of ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be Held, but all affected targets will be Slowed. Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Arrow.targetHelp: You are frozen in a Block of Ice. Once free, your Attack Rate and Running speed will be reduced slightly for a while.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.

Upshot.help: Greatly boosts your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases chance to hit and recharge time of all your powers for 10 seconds. Recharge: Long

messages.attackerHit: You tap into your inner core with your {PowerName} and are more deadly for a short while.

Flash_Arrow.help: This arrow explodes in a dazzling flash of light and sound. The targets are so blinded that they can hardly see a thing. Most villains will not be able to see past normal melee range, although some may have better perception. If the villains are attacked, they will be alerted to your presence, but will suffer a penalty to their chance to hit. Recharge: Slow
Flash_Arrow.targetHelp: The flash of light has left you dazzled. Your chance to hit and range of sight are greatly diminished.

messages.attackerHit: You blind {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}, reducing their perception and chance to hit!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} blinds you with a {PowerName}, reducing your perception and chance to hit!

messages.attackerHit: You blind {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}, reducing their perception and chance to hit!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} blinds you with a {PowerName}, reducing your perception and chance to hit!

Eagle_Eye.help: You have developed an incredible eyesight. Your accuracy is dramatically improved and your perception increased allowing you to better see distant and stealthy foes. You have also become resistant to powers that debuff your accuracy or chance to hit. In addition to being more accurate, your training also allows you to regenerate health and recovery endurance at an accelerated rate while this power is active. However, only half of this regeneration bonus is enhanceable. Recharge: Slow
Eagle_Eye.attackerHit: You are now more accurate and recover both health and endurance more quickly.

Quickness.help: Years of training have made you extremely agile and quick on your feet. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.
Quickness.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has increased your rate of attack.

EMP_Arrow.help: This arrow can unleash a massive electrostatic discharge on impact. This ESD can affect machines, and is even powerful enough to affect synaptic brain patterns. It will incapacitate all foes in its radius. Additionally, most machines and robots will take moderate high damage. Recharge: Very Long
EMP_Arrow.shortHelp: AoE, Foe Hold, Special vs. Robots
EMP_Arrow.targetHelp: You are held immobile by the Electrostatic Discharge.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} shocks you with their {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!
{PlayerSource} shocks you with their {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Gymnastics.help: While active, Gymnastics increases your Defense to all attacks, protects you against Knockback and adds resistance to Immobilization, Stuns and Holds. Moderately increases your jump height and distance while providing good air control.
Gymnastics.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has made you harder to hit.
